id.description: The unique identifier of this race.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the race begins started in the local timezone.

city.description: The name of the city in which the race is taking place.

state.description: The name of the state or geographical region in which the race is taking place.

country.description: The name of the country in which the race is taking place.

route_ids.description: The set of routes that cover this race's course.

measurement_preference.description: The unit system in which the race should be displayed.

url.description: The vanity URL of this race on Strava.

website_url.description: The URL of this race's website.
